TopicTitle: .23 Science bay lander design! (swap in the science lab)

Articles.Content:
.23 compatible lander

Download link: _23 compatible lander

Javascript is disabled. View full album

update: it barely does have enough fuel to land on Duna. BARELY

Elaborating on the 2nd picture, pop off the bottom half from the battery, remove both hitchhiker units, pop on the science lab (don't know if ALT=F12 is needed but it shouldn't) and be in business. You may want to add the Science lab to the 3rd action group as well.

This ship has the atmospheric scan as well as all other science groups. It also has 1 large mount battery (4000 charge) so it should plenty to transmit everything from the lab (when its released).

The lander seats 2 and the buggy seats 1.

Hope you guys like it!

- Avera9eJoe

By compatible I am assuming that the ship files work exactly the same as they have in older KSP ship files. I don't have .23! . By compatible I mean that this is a lander that once .23 comes out this Tuesday, you can download this lander, swap in the science lab, and get down to business. Or just admire the design I'm slightly impressed with it .
